modName: Moonpath to Elsweyr - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced Patch
summary: Compatibility patch for Moonpath to Elsweyr and Realistic Room Rental Enhanced that fixes Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
Compatibility patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9782/?]Moonpath to Elsweyr[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25029]Realistic Room Rental Enhanced[/url] that fixes Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath.

To be precise:
[list][*][i]Carriage room entrance:[/i] the oven is moved into the carriage room, as well as the clipping kettle, mead barrel, and also the wine bottle next to the mead barrel.[/*]
[*][i]Right side of the Inn:[/i] fixes the door/entrance location, size of the room, and placement of the props on the right side.[/*]
[*][i]Leftover objects:[/i] deleted the moved table and the leftover food, plates, etc. at the carriage entrance.[/*]
[/list]
Required mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51556/?]Typo Patch - Moonpath to Elsweyr[/url][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51556/?]
[/url]
[b][size=2]NOTE: The mead barrel isn't being moved for some reason - any help would be appreciated.[/size][/b]

Note for modders: saving the plugin with Creation Kit will cause it to stop working because the Realistic Room Rental esp will be lost as a master.
author: bur

files.name: Moonpath to Elsweyr - Realistic Room Rental Patch
